text: Pierre Victurnien Vergniaud ( 31 May 1753 â€“ 31 October 1793) was a French lawyer and statesman, a figure of the French Revolution. He was a deputy to the Assembly from Bordeaux. Vergniaud was an good public speaker. He supported Jacques Pierre Brissot and the Girondist faction. He was the President of the National Convention. title: Pierre Victurnien Vergniaud
